articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Joe Biden arrives in UK for G7 summit in Cornwall - his first official overseas trip as US president - Sky News
articles.description: Mr Biden will meet Boris Johnson in Cornwall on Thursday as part of an eight-day tour of the UK and Europe.

articles.author: Sarah Mooney
articles.title: 'No longer illegal to holiday': Vaccine passports passed by European Parliament - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The cert, due to be introduced in Ireland on July 19th, will show if a passenger has been vaccinated, tested negative for Covid, or has recovered from the virus
articles.content:
The European Parliament has passed the EUs proposal for vaccine passports, which aim to facilitate the resumption of travel across the bloc.
The proposal on Digital Green Certs was voted on by MEPs … [+972 chars]

articles.title: reuters:French lecturer reaches for stars with astronaut application - MENAFN.COM
articles.description:

Rouen: In a break from his job teaching engineering to students in France's Normandy region, Matthieu Pluvinage put the finishing touches on an application for a new job: astronaut.

articles.description: SAINT Petersburg: Thousands of fans are set to descend on Russia’s former imperial capital Saint Petersburg for Europe’s biggest football extravaganza...
